smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onSave appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file ApplicationTest.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file MainService.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file BootReceiver.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file SMSReceiver.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message:
Parentheses in (
                    email?.
                    split(",")?.
                    map { it.replace(" ", "") }?.
                    map { android.util.Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(it).matches() }?.
                    reduce { a, b -> a && b } == true
                    ) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: email?.
                    split(",")?.
                    map { it.replace(" ", "") }?.
                    map { android.util.Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(it).matches() }?.
                    reduce { a, b -> a && b } == true

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'android.content.SharedPreferences' is unused.
The import 'android.widget.Button' is unused.
The import 'android.os.Binder' is unused.
The import 'android.widget.Toast' is unused.
The import 'android.os.Build' is unused.
Function parameter button is unused.
Function parameter hasIncomingWebhook is unused.
Function parameter hasEmail is unused.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.
